item.title: CardboardCI
item.description: A collection of docker images that provide a common core for use in continuous integration. The idea of these images is to balance the following: Frequency of updates Standard set of tooling Common Environment Background Notes I encountered a lot of difficult with trying to automate the updating of those docker images. GitLab does not really have the idea of bots. Instead it would require a personal access token for my account, if I wanted to make commits.
